item.title: Yet another issue
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Okay once this issue is resolve i will have completed my first task! yay?

Okay … my code is a mess so if somebody could quickly sort it out that would be great.

Now for the main problem. As you can see the light green part does not extend all the way to the next header. Can somebody make it so it does please? And how do i do padding because i want the main text (“Hi im just writing because im bored and this is a test woooo”) like half a CM in from the left. If somebody could do that too that would be great. Anyways the images and code is below:
CSS:

/* CSS Document */


#content {
	font-family: "Georgia", Times New Roman, Times, serif;
	font-size: 15px;
	line-height: 19px;
	background-image: url(images/contentbar.gif);
	height: 19px;
	width: 627px;
	color:#FFFFFF;

}

#contentback {
	font-family: "Georgia", Times New Roman, Times, serif;
	font-size: 12px;
	line-height: 2px;
	background-color:#b4d54a;
	width: 627px;
	color:#FFFFFF;
	background-repeat:repeat-y;

	
}
	
	
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" 

"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1" />
<title>News</title>
<link href="style.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
<style type="text/css">

body,td,th {
	font-family: Georgia, Times New Roman, Times, serif;
}
body {
	background-color: #acd037;

	
}
style3 {padding-left: 2cm} 
p {background-color: #b4d54a}
</style></head>

<body>
<!-- Start of News -->

<div class="content" id="content">   Hello blah blah </div>

<div class="contentback" id="contentback"><br /><br /><br />Weee 
<p>Hi im just writing because im bored and this is a test woooo</p>
<p>Hi im just writing because im bored and this is a test woooo</p>
<p>Hi im just writing because im bored and this is a test woooo</p>
<p>Hi im just writing because im bored and this is a test woooo</p>
<p>Hi im just writing because im bored and this is a test woooo</p>
</div>
<div class="content" id="content">   Hello blah blah </div>
 
</body>

</html>

Images:
- Just to show you what the problem is…
- Content bar if you need to test it out…

On another note… could anyone who knows what they are doing when it comes to coding give me their msn? Because i feel really stupid posting all of these topics…
